Row.Text: A unique settler only America can build. Unlike the settler it replaces, this unit cannot be captured but can be killed. The colonist ignores terrain costs and has 2 movement.
The colonists were people who travelled far and wide to find new land to claim.
Use the Colonist to expand quickly and get your empire running faster than other civilizations.
